WRITING.TEXT: How many old bandaids, turds, and chewed pieces of gum are in there?
But you can play them when you're a kid, and then rediscover them as an adult.

Realize that it's temporary. I know it's hard to pull yourself out, but if you're aware that everything sucks because you're depressed and that it will pass, and that everything doesn't actually suck it can help. Exercise helps me too. Going for a run or just doing some cardio can really get your endorphins up.
And depressing. Glad things are good now though. I always try and look at every negative as a learning experience and a chance to grow. Sounds like sleazy_does_it is doing much better now.
